DOCNAME: CASE OF BRISKIN AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Degrading treatment) (Substantive aspect)

CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the inadequate conditions of their detention .
